alert.note: Alert for Western King William (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 02 at 2:50PM EST until January 03 at 4:00PM EST by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 4 AM TO 4 PM EST MONDAY... * WHAT...Heavy wet snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 5 inches. * WHERE...Western King William County. * WHEN...From 4 AM to 4 PM EST Monday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning commute.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. For the latest road conditions in Virginia or Maryland, please call 5 1 1. For the latest road information in North Carolina, go to http://DriveNC.gov.
